recommendations: Emma Tate
Consultant at CULINARY DELIGHT CATERING
January 18, 2016, Emma was a client of Aimee’s

I had the pleasure of working with Aimee Stair, she was an expert in customer service and SEO, Google Plus, Bing and did research on the key words that preformed the best on all of the search engines.Aimee help put our Company on the first page of Google Plus within a few weeks and we remain there today, I simply followed all of the advise that Aimee so patiently provided me with.At a time when Google required companies to have a mobile website, Aimee brought that to my attention and had the mobile site up and running in time to meet Google's guide lines.I could go on and on about the wonderful service and expert advise that Aimee provided me each time I called into the company.We are still going strong and with the knowledge that Aimee provided me with we did  not hit the usual January decline this year.I just want too thank Aimee for all that she did for our Team at Culinary Delight Catering.All the best,Emma

John Thomas
Director Of Software Development at Racepak
August 31, 2016, John was senior to Aimee but didn’t manage directly

Not only is John a highly skilled technical professional, he is a highly effective leader. In my time working with him at RYNO he was a great sounding board and an excellent nuts and bolts, technical expert. He helped bring many ideas that I had to fruition. If he was not directly assisting with elaborate technical pieces I had little experience with then he was helping in listening and giving feedback and guidance on how to navigate it myself. John really just wants to help those around him grow professionally and succeed. I find myself very luck to have worked with him and he will be a tremendous asset wherever he lands next.

Tracy L. Montgomery
Data Analyst
September 28, 2015, Tracy L. worked with Aimee in the same group

Tracy was essentially a walking encyclopedia of internal billing and logistical processes by which the professional services department operated from top to bottom while I worked at EIG. If I ever had any question about any project ranging from people involved to billing and contract details she often knew these things offhand or had an answer very, very quickly. An asset like Tracy was so immensely valuable to an organization looking to create and/or reinforce standard operating procedures for a large client base in exceptionally diverse and challenging billing environments. I simply don't know how she did/does it. If I had to guess...I'd say magic!
